{{menutrail|Main menu}} [[File:GameFilesMenu.png|thumb|The game files menu in [[Hexen: Deathkings of the Dark Citadel|Deathkings]].]]The '''game files menu''' was created by [[Raven Software]] to regroup both the [[load game menu]] and the [[save game menu]] under a single entry on the [[main menu]] in both ''[[Heretic]]'' and ''[[Hexen]]''. Its [[MENUDEF]] name is {{c|GameFilesMenu}}.
*'''[[Load game menu]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_load}}}} :Allows to resume a game from a save. *'''[[Save game menu]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_save}}}} :Allows to save the ongoing game. Accessing it is denied if not currently within a game.
==See also== * [[Savegame]] [[Category:Menus]]
